name: The Portal Network [WIP]
description:
This is all very early stages development for a classic Lucasarts-style point-and-click Adventure.

Using Rian Trost's (@riantrost) beautiful hand-drawn backgrounds The Portal Network (absolutely working title) is a story about kids, their secret base in the woods and the strange labyrinth that lies beneath. Y'know, normal kid stuff.

This is built in Unity using the Adventure Creator Toolkit (http://www.adventurecreator.org/) and as you can see the current main character is their built-in placeholder character.

It's going to change around a lot but here's the bones, should be an interesting project.
